Zeke's Convergence

Cost: 2400
+20 Ability Haste
+30 Armor

UNIQUE Passive - Convergence: For 4 seconds after you immobilize an enemy, your Accomplice's basic attacks (on-hit) and ability hits deal 25 − 50 (based on level) (+ 7.5% AP) (+ 1.5% maximum health) bonus magic damage to that enemy.

UNIQUE Active - Conduit: Designate an allied champion as the Accomplice, forming a tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as the Accomplice by one Zeke's Convergence at a time (60 second cooldown).
